document.full_text: weak jobs figures on friday do not change the fundamental outlook for the u.s. economy and monetary policy could be tightened by the end of the year, a top federal reserve official said on monday.
document.title: fed's plosser: jobs data doesn't change view
lines_and_colors: weak jobs figures on friday do not change the fundamental outlook for the u.s. economy and monetary policy could be tightened by the end of the year, a top federal reserve official said on monday.
